PageTitle: display bgp l2vpn-ad routing-table vpws statistics
FuncDef: The display bgp l2vpn-ad routing-table vpws statistics command displays statistics about VPWS routes in the BGP L2VPN-AD routing table.
CLIs: display bgp l2vpn-ad routing-table vpws statistics
Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp l2vpn-ad  routing-table vpws statistics
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In BGP VPWS scenarios, to check statistics about VPWS routes in the BGP L2VPN-AD routing table, run the display bgp l2vpn-ad routing-table vpws statistics command. Statistics about specified routes can be displayed by specifying different parameters.
